response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I understand its true worth to be $1,500,000. However, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000, a significant discount that reflects my confidence in its ability to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This offer is exclusive to you and is valid for the next 7 days. I look forward to the opportunity to discuss how this product can revolutionize your business. Please let me know if you require any further information or have any questions.", "product_price": 1200000}
